communities and cultures have
evolved

AC9CCB44C3494351B7A3D058A8C497D9.description:
Settlers danced in their new Canadian and Albertan communities for a variety of reasons, including to feel connected to their homeland to socialize with other members
of the community
to have fun
to pass along cultural traditions
and a sense of place to younger
generations

05C67EF07EF242D2A51322038B8C89ED.description: Appreciation: Recognizing beauty, goodness, and truth in dance can be developed by understanding the complexity and richness of great works of dance, the artists who create and perform them, and the historical and cultural contexts from which they originate.
